SEARCH
Package aor.fpbackend.service

Class TaskService

java.lang.Object
aor.fpbackend.service.TaskService
@Path("/tasks") public class TaskService extends Object
TaskService is a JAX-RS resource class that provides RESTful endpoints for task management, including task creation, updates, dependencies, and retrievals by project.

    • getAllTasksByProject

      @GET @Path("/project/{projectId}") @Produces("application/json") public List<TaskGetDto> getAllTasksByProject(@PathParam("projectId") long projectId) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Retrieves all tasks for a given project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the project ID.
      Returns:
      a list of task data transfer objects.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project is not found.

      Parameters:
      taskId - the task ID.
      Returns:
      the task data transfer object.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the task is not found.

    • addTaskToProject

      @POST @Path("/add/project/{projectId}") @Consumes("application/json") public void addTaskToProject(@Valid @Valid TaskCreateDto taskCreateDto) throws EntityNotFoundException, InputValidationException, UnknownHostException, ElementAssociationException
      Adds a task to a project.
      Parameters:
      taskCreateDto - the task creation data transfer object.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project or user is not found.
      InputValidationException - if the input data is invalid.
      UnknownHostException - if an unknown host error occurs.
      ElementAssociationException - if there is an association error.

      Parameters:

    • addDependencyToTask

      @PUT @Path("/add/dependency/{projectId}") @Consumes("application/json") public void addDependencyToTask(@PathParam("projectId") long projectId, @Valid @Valid TaskDependencyDto dependencyDto) throws EntityNotFoundException, InputValidationException, DatabaseOperationException
      Adds a dependency to a task.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the project ID.
      dependencyDto - the task dependency data transfer object.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project or task is not found.
      InputValidationException - if the input data is invalid.
      DatabaseOperationException - if a database error occurs.
